txt.en: The Corsair ships can be reached using the boat to the south of the Gondorian Captain.\n\nYou should board the ships and defeat the remaining Corsair forces.

'Well done, [placeholder].

'I've been told there are no more major groups of resistance left in the bay. With that, our great city should be free from the Corsair threat.

'In the meantime we can moor their ships, and prepare for what is next.'
Thandor, the Gondorian Captain, can be located in the market east of Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Thandor.
A band of surviving Corsairs has rallied in the bay of the Anduin, and Thandor has requested your help in dealing with them.

'A small band of Corsairs managed to survive the battle to retake this city, and forms a blockade near the eastern river-gate. We don't want to destroy the ships since the debris would delay our advance towards Minas Tirith.\n\n'We need you to board these ships, and defeat any remaining Corsairs you might find. This is our only solution to clear that blockade, [placeholder].'
